about_the_game:
The Color-Switching Parkour Game
In this game, you can experience 10 unique levels designed for original color-switching plus parkour gameplay. Switch between three colors: red, green, and blue as each one exposes a different version of the level. Wall jump, zipline, slide and climb between these three different versions of each level.

Chrome Switcher enables you to switch between three different colors while parkouring your way across the level, something never seen before for parkour games. Experience a retro-filled world with Synthwave music composed by DGTV.



Features
  • Challenging Levels:
    Traverse through 10 levels each uniquely designed to give you a challenging parkour experience as you time your acrobatic skills between every color.

  • One Level, Three Versions:
    Every level has three different versions: red, green, and blue. Each version shows different parkour objects you maneuver through.

  • Freedom of Movement:
    Packed with an armory of acrobatic movement, fly across pits with wall-jumps, zipline across the void, wall-climb above a dangerous fall to your death, and more as you navigate through each level.

name: Chrome Switcher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A color-switching parkour game. Utilize your acrobatic abilities to navigate through different versions of each level. Wall jump, zip-line, slide, climb across each color.
